shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the remote media stream falls back to the audio-only stream due to poor network conditions or switches back to the video stream after the network conditions improve.

p.codeblock: public void onRemoteSubscribeFallbackToAudioOnly(int uid, boolean isFallbackOrRecover) {}
public virtual void OnRemoteSubscribeFallbackToAudioOnly(uint uid, bool isFallbackOrRecover)

section.p: If you call and set option as , the SDK triggers this callback when the remote media stream falls back to audio-only mode due to poor downlink conditions, or when the remote media stream switches back to the video after the downlink network condition improves.
section.note: Once the remote media stream switches to the low-quality stream due to poor network conditions, you can monitor the stream switch between a high-quality and low-quality stream in the callback.

plentry.pd: The user ID of the remote user.

ul.li: : The remotely subscribed media stream falls back to audio-only due to poor network conditions.
: The remotely subscribed media stream switches back to the video stream after the network conditions improved.
